directorCorrespondenceAddressLinkTitle: If the registered office address changes in the future, do you want this to apply to the director's correspondence address too?
directorCorrespondenceAddressLinkYesHint: The director's correspondence address will be recorded as the 'same as the registered office address'. This means future changes will also apply to the director's correspondence address.
directorCorrespondenceAddressLinkNoHint: Youâ€™ll have to update the correspondence address manually if it changes.
